body: You can use [`tf.reverse_sequence`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/reverse_sequence) to reverse it for the backward direction. Then you can reverse it afterwards again. You have to do it separately for the forward and backward direction, and also separately for each layer. I implemented that in our framework [Returnn](https://github.com/rwth-i6/returnn). Of course, that degrades the performance. I did a benchmark [here](http://returnn.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tf_lstm_benchmark.html).
